## Penguins 2

Hello and welcome to Penguins 2, a website for exploring and modeling data from the Palmer Penguins data set (available [here](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/palmerpenguins/readme/README.html)).

![](/images/penguin.gif)

Don't ask what happened to Penguins 1.
